step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your arm overhead and feeling the resistance. Try to keep your shoulders relaxed.
You're doing well opening your palm and fingers wide. Focus on a strong fist and tightening your muscles as you inhale.
Excellent job opening your hand and relaxing your muscles as you exhale. Keep visualizing the fluid moving.
Your fist and muscle tightening are good. For the next repetitions, try to make your hand opening even wider and more relaxed.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with the overhead pumping! Remember to stretch your arm up, make a strong fist while breathing in, and then open your hand wide as you breathe out. Keep up the good work to help with fluid flow.
